title: Implment KeePass integration
author: kmscode
body_snippet:
https://mremoteng.atlassian.net/browse/MR-490
Add the possibility to link KeePass entries to mRemoteNG and connect the entries to different servers.

It eases up the administration when changing passwords in a multi-domain environment and adds some extra security.

Remote Desktop Manager has this feature and it is pretty neat.

comments.author: AN1MATEK
comments.snippet:
Just to add my 2 cents: KeePass 2 is the "hardcore" tool for sysadmins. XC is a fork from X that looks good but misses a lot of functionality and it was originally planned for MacOS iirc. KeePass 2 is robust, actively maintained, has tons of options, plugins, etc. If you see people speaking about just KeePass, this means the version from Dominik.
I really hope this will be implemented some day. Thanks to all the developers for the excellent work.
